thread.title: Aston Villa boss Steve Bruce has vowed striker Ross McCormack must apologise if he wishes to have a future at the club after the ‘Gate-gate’ situation
thread.title_full: Aston Villa boss Steve Bruce has vowed striker Ross McCormack must apologise if he wishes to have a future at the club after the ‘Gate-gate’ situation

author: sunsportonline
title: Aston Villa boss Steve Bruce has vowed striker Ross McCormack must apologise if he wishes to have a future at the club after the ‘Gate-gate’ situation
text:
EFL Bruce shuts gate on ross Aston Villa boss Steve Bruce has vowed striker Ross McCormack must apologise if he wishes to have a future at the club after the ‘Gate-gate’ situation 
The 30-year-old Scottish international was shipped to Nottingham Forest on loan until the end of the season after his manager lost patience with him by brendan mcloughlin
